html:
PC Number Date Chapter Chapter Year Bill Dept
 2025-00522025-01-31ESDC, CEIC
ActEmployment Insurance Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Employment Insurance Regulations (Pilot Project No. 23)
PrecisRegulations Amending the EMPLOYMENT INSURANCE REGULATIONS (PILOT PROJECT NO. 23) in order to (1) provide a one-time credit of 300 hours of insurable employment to help workers gain access to EI benefits; and (2) to increase the weeks of available benefits for workers in specific postal codes affected by the wildfires in Jasper and Bunibonibee.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2025-0010 Publication Date: 2025-02-12
AttachmentsAttachment
precis: Regulations Amending the EMPLOYMENT INSURANCE REGULATIONS (PILOT PROJECT NO. 23) in order to (1) provide a one-time credit of 300 hours of insurable employment to help workers gain access to EI benefits; and (2) to increase the weeks of available benefits for workers in specific postal codes affected by the wildfires in Jasper and Bunibonibee.
